document_data.name: Gildamesh
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gildamesh''' was an innkeeper and the owner of the [[Black Stone Inn]] in [[Daggerford]] around [[1370 DR]].

{{quote|''I'm just tellin' ya to be on your guard here, lass. Them who come to the Black Stone do so 'cause they been kicked out of every decent tavern from 'ere to [[Waterdeep]]. ''|Gildamesh}}
document_data.Appearance: Gildamesh appeared to be a gruff-looking man with angry and grim facial expression of a person looking for a fight.
document_data.Personality: Gildamesh considered his inn to be his one true love.
document_data.Activities: Gildamesh bought a former ballroom where [[Zhentarim]] agents had once committed a mass murder and turned it into an inn. Many people believed him to be a [[Zhent]]. He himself, although, insinuated dislike of the [[Black Network]] and in [[1372 DR]] would warn his well-paying customers of the recent increase of Zhentarim activity in Daggerford and claimed that only good Zhent was a dead one.
